p: V. amurensis (roots and rhizomes) has been extensively employed in Chinese medicine for the treatment of neurological disorders. The petroleum ether extract improves sleep by reducing the sleep latency and delaying the sleep duration of mice [ 73]. Using human cell lines and mice models Wu et al. [ 36] recently reported the anti-inflammatory and neuroprotective properties of kissoone B and extracts of this species, suggesting its capacity for neurological diseases treatment.
